hadiths.text: Jabir and Abu Salih reported on the authority of Abu Hurairah:Sulaik al-Ghatafani came (to the mosque) while the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was giving the (Friday) sermon. He asked him: Did you pray something ? He said: No. He said: Offer two rak'ahs and make them short

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا دَخَلَ الرَّجُلُ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Enters While The Imam Is Delivering The Khutbah
